title: godoc TOC  generated links of methods and functions with same name always jump to function
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. See the documentation of the go core package "url"
2. Click on method "func (*URL) Parse"
3.

What is the expected output?
Jump to documentation of "func (*URL) Parse"

What do you see instead?
jump to function "func Parse"


Please provide any additional information below.
Seems like godoc doesn't differ between methods and funcs having the same name.
